component.name: MEGAsync
component.summary: Easy automated syncing between your computers and your MEGA cloud drive

description.p: With the MEGA Desktop App, you'll have full control over your uploads and downloads. You can also sync or back up your computers with MEGA to prevent data loss and access the latest version of your data anywhere, anytime.

ul.li: Manage your uploads and downloads, add transfers to the queue, sort, search for, prioritise, pause, and cancel transfers.
Upload large files of unlimited size, store any type of file or folder, and with a generous transfer limits with all our plans.
With MEGA's zero-knowledge encryption, your synced files are stored securely in MEGA.
Create password-protected links with expiry dates for files and folders and share them with anyone, even non-MEGA users.
Sync multiple computers fast with MEGA at the same time.
Sync on Windows, macOS, or Linux, or even between different operating systems.
Easily access your cloud files through our desktop app, mobile apps or the web.
Public source available in our GitHub repository.

description.p: You can choose from a range of plans with different storage limits of up to 16 TB. You can also get unlimited storage space with Pro Flexi and Business plans. These plans start from 3 TB of storage, but you can use more space as and when you need it.
